mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Miley, Michael, 1841-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of William Adair. In Pose 1 from 1910, he is wearing a suit and bow tie. In Pose 2 from 1925, he is wearing a suit and tie. In Pose 3 from 1926, he is wearing a suit and tie with a Shriners hat. In Pose 4 from 1931, he is wearing a tuxedo with a Shriners hat. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portrait of William Adair (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
